title: Collect.chat
shortDescription: Create interactive chatbots to boost your conversion
longDescription:
**Collect.chat** lets you collect data from your website visitors using interactive conversations. 

You made an amazing website, ramped up your SEO and increased traffic on your site. But that's not enough. One of the problems we often face after creating a website is making customers out of the visitors on the site. It’s not an easy problem to solve.

We are solving this problem using conversations. Through our platform, you can easily make chatbots that engage with your audience and understands who they are and what they are looking for. 

![How Collect.chat works](https://collect.chat/assets/images/features/howitworks.png)

Collect.chat bots help you to collect data from your website visitors like
- **Leads**
- **Appointments**
-  **Enquiries**
- **Meetings**
- **Feedbacks**
- **Surveys**
- **Suggestions**


![Features](https://collect.chat/assets/images/features/featurelist.png)


#### AN INSURANCE FOR YOUR PAID TRAFFIC
Capturing leads is essential when you pay for the traffic to your website. Collect.chat acts as the insurance policy for your paid traffic.


#### SHARE CALENDAR AND GET MEETING BOOKINGS
Let your visitors book available time slot from your calendar quickly. You can connect your chatbot to google calendar so that bookings will appear on the calendar instantly and busy slots are hidden from the visitor.

#### TRANSLATE TO ANY LANGUAGE
Talk to your visitors in their language. Let your visitor's language be  French, German, Chinese, Arabic etc.., You can translate every text on the chatbot into that language.

#### DON’T LET YOUR BUSINESS SLEEP

The fully automated chatbot will collect leads even when all of your sales reps are asleep or on vacation. Don’t let your business sleep ever.

#### EASY TO USE DRAG AND DROP BUILDER

Making the bot in Collect.chat is very easy. Just drag & drop to create interactive questions to the conversational form and you are good to go. [Watch a short video](https://help.collect.chat/article/show/56568-quick-start) to learn how easy it is.

#### POWERFUL DATA METRICS

Collect.chat visually displays your data. Through our in-depth analysis, you will understand the requirements of your customers and thus improve your service.

#### Install today to join **10,000+** happy businesses worldwide using Collect.chat!
![Clients](https://collect.chat/assets/images/features/clients.png)
instructions:
##### Installation Guide
1.  Feel free to play around with our demo bot
2.  [Create a Collect.chat account](https://app.collect.chat/getstarted)  if you don't have one
3.  Make a kick-ass chatbot  
	[Watch a quick video](https://help.collect.chat/article/show/56568-quick-start) to learn how,
	[See templates](https://collect.chat/templates/)  for inspiration 
4.  Connect your account below and Select a bot
5. Woohoo! Time to notice the boost in your conversion and engagement.
author: Collect.chat Inc.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

accountHelp.helpvalue: To create and manage chatbots, visit Collect.chat Dashboard

proposedApp.title: Collect.chat
proposedApp.shortDescription: Create interactive chatbots that boosts conversion
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Collect.chat** is the easiest way to add a chat interface on your site.

You made an amazing website. Bravo!

You ramped up your SEO and increased traffic on your site. Good for you!

Wouldn’t it be awesome, if you could tap into this traffic that is coming into your site? Using Collect.chat, Your visitor is 3 times more likely to interact with you before leaving your website.

#### INCREASE CONVERSIONS

When you get the contact information of every single visitor on your website, you have an opportunity to convert each and every one of them.

#### ENGAGE EVERY VISITORS

The key to the success of your Website is to keep your visitors engaged. The more time they spent on your website, the more likely they will become paying customers.

#### TAKE UX TO THE NEXT LEVEL

Having an awesome User experience helps to establish an early emotional connection with your visitor. Our conversational form adds a certain delight for the visitor that achieves reliability.


#### DON’T LET YOUR BUSINESS SLEEP

The fully automated chatbot will collect leads even when all of your sales reps are asleep or on vacation. Don’t let your business sleep ever.

#### INSURE YOUR PAID TRAFFIC

Capturing email addresses is essential when you pay for the traffic to your website. Collect.chat acts as the insurance policy for your paid traffic.

#### POWERFUL DATA METRICS

Collect.chat visually displays your data. Through our in-depth analysis, you will understand the requirements of your customers and thus improve your service.
proposedApp.instructions:
### Hi 👋, Feel free to try the *demo chatbot* 🤖👩‍💻

1.  Please [Create a Collect.chat account](https://app.collect.chat/getstarted)  if you don't have one
2.  Make a kick-ass chatbot  
	[Watch a quick video]([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jn6qPUfZgxI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jn6qPUfZgxI)) to learn how 
	[See templates](https://collect.chat/templates/)  for inspiration 
3.  Integrate with your Cloudflare website
4. Woohoo! Experience the boost in your conversion and engagement.
proposedApp.author: Collect.chat Inc.
